entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
